mutants.code:
def add_two_numbers(a, b):
    """"""
    while b != 0:
        carry = a & b
        a = a ^ b
        b = carry << 1
    return a

def add_two_numbers(a, b):
    """This function takes two numbers and returns their sum using bitwise operations."""
    while b == 0:
        carry = a & b
        a = a ^ b
        b = carry << 1
    return a

def add_two_numbers(a, b):
    """This function takes two numbers and returns their sum using bitwise operations."""
    while b != 1:
        carry = a & b
        a = a ^ b
        b = carry << 1
    return a

def add_two_numbers(a, b):
    """This function takes two numbers and returns their sum using bitwise operations."""
    while b != -1:
        carry = a & b
        a = a ^ b
        b = carry << 1
    return a

def add_two_numbers(a, b):
    """This function takes two numbers and returns their sum using bitwise operations."""
